entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
